column2: How do these sync?There is a zapier integration that copies the entries from each functional spreadsheet to the consolidated one. It has been buggy so I am manually reviewing that all records flow.What if I have a list that I want to consolidate?Please attach a link in the pinned post on the Employees @ Meta LinkedIn group, I will do daily consolidations.
